summary: Discover the Inspiration Behind the Coin - Ursula, the talented daughter of Matt Furie, showcases her inherited and personal creativity through her vibrant Instagram feed. Each whimsical drawing she posts captures a unique blend of playful characters, dreamy landscapes, and quirky scenes, infused with a sense of wonder and joy. Her art not only highlights her skill but also her ability to tell emotive stories through her imaginative creations.
